items.Title: TriStar Cobra Tactical 12 Gauge Shotgun - Factory New, 20" Barrel with Original Box
items.Overview: The TriStar Cobra Tactical is a rugged, purpose-built 12-gauge shotgun designed for defensive, range, and utility use. Chambered for 3" shells and configured with a 20-inch barrel, this model emphasizes reliability and straightforward operation in a tactical-style package. Manufactured and imported by TriStar Sporting Arms in Turkey, the Cobra Tactical offers a solid, no-nonsense platform suited to shooters seeking a factory-fresh tactical shotgun at an accessible price point.
items.Make: TriStar Sporting Arms / TriStar Sporting Arms
items.I&P Summary: The Cobra Tactical line reflects TriStar?s focus on producing practical, serviceable shotguns with modern styling and dependable performance. Built overseas to TriStar specifications, these shotguns have earned a following among shooters looking for straightforward functionality without unnecessary complexity.
items.Condition Summary: This shotgun is in true factory-new condition, showing no handling wear, blemishes, or use beyond standard factory testing. Finish across the barrel, receiver, and furniture is clean and uniform, with all components retaining their original factory appearance. A fresh, as-issued example.
items.Mechanics:
The action functions smoothly and positively, consistent with a new TriStar shotgun. Controls operate correctly, with clean cycling and proper lockup. The chamber and feeding system show no signs of use.
Bore Rating: 10/10.The bore is bright and clean with no imperfections.
items.Sights: Factory ghost ring rear sight with front post
items.Accessories & Paperwork:
Original factory box
Factory accessories and paperwork (standard for factory-new firearm)
items.Notes For Buyers: This TriStar Cobra Tactical is factory new and has not been fired or disassembled beyond standard factory processes. A basic lubrication and safety inspection is recommended prior to use. Suitable for range use, training, or defensive applications where a straightforward 12-gauge platform is desired.
items.Feature Highlights:
Factory-new TriStar Cobra Tactical shotgun
12-gauge with 3" chamber
20" barrel with cylinder choke
Tactical-style configuration with ghost ring sights
5-round capacity with faux extended magazine tube
Includes original factory box
items.MarketNote: Tactical-style pump shotguns like the Cobra Tactical remain consistently popular due to their versatility, ease of use, and broad application range. Factory-new examples continue to attract interest from buyers seeking a reliable, ready-to-use shotgun platform without aftermarket modification.

items.Title: Chiappa Citadel M1-22 .22 LR Rifle - Factory New, 18" Barrel with Original Box & Two 30-Round Magazines
items.Overview: The Chiappa Citadel M1-22 is a rimfire rifle styled after the classic M1 Carbine, chambered in .22 LR and designed for affordable training, recreational shooting, and small-caliber fun. Manufactured in Italy by Kimar and imported by Chiappa Firearms, the M1-22 blends nostalgic military-inspired aesthetics with modern rimfire reliability. This example is offered in true factory-new condition and includes the original box along with two 30-round magazines.

Its lightweight design and familiar layout make it especially appealing for training new shooters or enjoying extended range sessions.

items.Title: Izhmash Saiga-12 12 Gauge Shotgun - Factory New, 19" Barrel with Threaded Muzzle, Original Box & 5-Round Magazine
items.Overview: The Izhmash Saiga-12 is a semi-automatic, magazine-fed 12-gauge shotgun built on the legendary Kalashnikov operating system. Designed for durability and reliability, the Saiga-12 gained worldwide recognition for bringing AK-style robustness to a shotgun platform. Manufactured in Russia by Izhmash and imported by Legion USA Inc., this example is offered in true factory-new condition and features a threaded barrel, pistol grip configuration, and classic Saiga layout. It includes the original box and a 5-round magazine.
items.I&P Summary: The Saiga-12 represents one of the most recognizable Russian-made sporting and tactical shotguns ever imported into the U.S. Built at the historic Izhmash factory, these shotguns are closely tied to the AK lineage and are widely respected for their rugged construction and distinctive operating system.
items.Condition Summary: This shotgun remains in untouched, factory-new condition with no evidence of handling wear, blemishes, or use beyond standard factory testing.
